data.text:
Summer Prestige class promotion !
Experience our wonderful Prestige class on https://t.co/XHKbhzl2Mq /AC https://t.co/9Rd4hLJfJE
@twinfold Please contact our service center about this matter. Thank you. /JN

Planning your dream vacation?

@twinfold Hope this may help you to understand the policy of emergency exit seat assignment. Thanks. /JN https://t.co/juT1YDZTxH

@mike7534 Hi, Michael, the daily service will last until October 29 and it will change to 5 weekly services from the October 30. Thanks. /JN

We’re now serving daily flight between Incheon and #Toronto #Canada. /JN https://t.co/VF0wOcx82u
@JordanJansen We'll serve light meal and hot lunch from BNE to ICN with the selection of western and Asian style meals. Thanks. /JN
@julieracano Hi, Julie, our flight KE36 on July 6 from Atlanta was on time departure, not early departure. Thanks. /JN
@kristinekoko Hi, Kristine, for the flight condition, pls visit https://t.co/UxLXUnDV0F or call our service center at +886-2-2518-2200. /JN
@ZaydenCoy Hi, please let us know how we may help. Thanks. /JN
@ValentinPfyffer We regret for the belated reply, please check our earlier DM. Thanks. /JN
@NadiaLee Thanks, We've DM you earlier. Please check it out. /JN
@ValentinPfyffer Hi, Valentin, we've just DM you about this matter. Please check it out. Thanks. /JN

@iamAJGutierrez Glad you like our inflight meal. Your photos are great, thanks for sharing. /JN
@jeehwan34 Nice graphic. Wishing you a wonderful flight with us. /JN
@frankhua Hi, Frank, you could find the Asian movies list on page 96 at this link https://t.co/XrppoSHCWI Thanks. /JN
@jhuynh812 Glad you enjoyed our service and we can't wait to welcome you and your family aboard again. /JN

Hi, Martin, there are few flights after KE1232 available, please contact our ground staff for assistance. Thanks. /JN

@enabiah Hi, please contact our office at your landing airport about this matter .Thanks. /JN

@martinrottler Hope you had a pleasant flight. /JN
